reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel was awesome in every way. It was very affordable for a Ritz Carlton. It was soooo comfortable! The staff was fantastic. They sent us fruit and champagne everytime we rechecked in. The roof top pool was great. The location within Santiago was excellent as well. There were quite a few restaurants within walking distance. There is also a subway stop very close that we used alot as well. I always felt very safe around the Ritz. If I was ever in Santiago again, this is the only place I would stay!!!
